column4: 2 days ago I got rid of windows and installed Ubuntu on my laptop - now it doesn't find my wireless network (it does find other networks, just not mine) I'm considering switching back to windows. But before that, I would like to know if there is anything else that could cause it not finding my network. Any ideas?
when my wireless wasnt working it was because i forgot to turn it on =D lol
IÂ´m pretty sure i switched it on in the firmware
i mean the notebook switch... but that probably isnt the case very often =P
yeah, it picks up other networks
